DC CODE § 47-1332

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Mayor shall sell all real property on which the tax is in arrears unless otherwise provided by law.
The Mayor shall designate a single agency to conduct tax sales in the District.

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)
